sourcesContent:
Edición de portfolio

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PortfolioService } from 'src/app/service/portfolio.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-editable', templateUrl: './editable.component.html', styleUrls: ['./editable.component.css'] }) export class EditableComponent implements OnInit { miPortfolio:any; miPortfolioLoaded:Promise; constructor( private datosPortfolio:PortfolioService ){ miPortfolioLoaded = false; } ngOnInit(): void { this.datosPortfolio.obtenerDatos().subscribe(data=>{ this.miPortfolio=data; this.miPortfolioLoaded = Promise.resolve(true); //this.user=sessionStorage.getItem('currentUser'); }) } }
